mapper.select: SELECT category.name , category.id AS category_id , product.id , product.description , product.content , product.event , product.create_date , product.modify_date , dpinfo.id AS display_info_id , dpinfo.opening_hours , dpinfo.place_name , dpinfo.place_lot , dpinfo.place_street , dpinfo.tel , dpinfo.homepage , dpinfo.email FROM product , display_info dpinfo , category WHERE product.id = dpinfo.product_id AND product.category_id = category.id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
